lead_paragraph: Sunderland's on-loan defender DeAndre Yedlin is hoping to do his parent club Tottenham Hotspur a favour this weekend by helping his team beat Leicester City, Spurs' main rivals at the top of the Premier League.

headline.print_headline: Sunderland's Yedlin Aims to Ruin Leicester's Hollywood Ending
headline.main: Sunderland's Yedlin Aims to Ruin Leicester's Hollywood Ending

snippet: Sunderland's on-loan defender DeAndre Yedlin is hoping to do his parent club Tottenham Hotspur a favour this weekend by helping his team beat Leicester City, Spurs' main rivals at the top of the Premier League....
